candidates.name: Device Layer
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : IoT devices, mobile phones, and user devices

candidates.name: Edge Layer
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Edge servers and gateways that process data locally

candidates.name: Cloud Layer
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Centralized servers for heavy processing and storage

candidates.name: Performance
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Applications respond instantly to user interactions

candidates.name: Reliability
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Services continue working even when cloud connectivity is poor

candidates.name: Cost Efficiency
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Reduced data transfer costs and cloud computing fees

candidates.name: Privacy
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Sensitive data can be processed locally without leaving the device

candidates.name: Scalability
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Distributed processing handles massive scale more efficiently
